column4: Can someone help me with users, groups and file permissions? I know the elementrary but certain things makes me lost.
have a specific question/
It seems it doesn't know that I'm in the group that owns the dir.
what did you change your group to?
did you change the group ownership of the directory?
yep.
I checked both /etc/passwd and /etc/group. everything seems okay
you doing ls -l ?
what's the ls-l ouput line for that dir?
arh.. nm I lost the connex to the server now :s
then what was the command you used to chown the dir?
still there?
did you figure out what the problem was?
nah. I've seen it before but then it somehow got to work. I never figured how.. I just tried to reboot the server but now I've got a few problems getting it online again :s
hmmm, I see. anyhow, I strongly suspect that the group of the dir does not match your user's group (web-admin)
hmn. Must be something like that.
now it works, after rebooting
interesting. oh, did you logout after chgrp'ing?
No i didn't :)
that's why, then
here's the next question, can you still sudo with that user?
yes, sure.
ok
